title: PSA: If you don't like the position your given..
body: Then Ban Lux, someone will dodge. Been working all day and yesterday.

replies.body:
"If you don't like the position you're given…"

Then get over it and deal with it or dodge?
Or ask if someone wants to trade
Too bad it fails in 99% of cases.

If someone says, "Hey, I main mid lane and would prefer to go there if possible," I'll give it to them. If someone comes into champ select and says, "I'm mid fucker, go kys," you can be sure I'm going to dodge before I give you mid.
Which is exactly why we should be allowed to report in champ select.
Yeah, most of the time I'm forced to dodge, knowing that they'll probably just do the same thing if they don't get their position in the next champ select which sucks.

That's how I'd respond, if they are impolite.

Hence why I never start with insults when I want to swap roles or trade champions.

It still doesn't work.
I don't know why people think I'm going to willingly let them take my position if they're going to be toxic. Being polite always works better.
Great, you're not everyone.
I actually ask in a nice way if I can have the role I wanted,  at least 5 outta 6 times it works.
Seems like EUNE is a state of mind... kind of like making fishsticks, but not that delicate.
On EUNE, it seems the average is more inclined to rage than to be reasonable. I've never understood that mentality. :/

Honestly this works for me more often than not.

People are generally much more willing to adjust if you are polite.
It won't work every time, but i probably get a swap (1st or 2nd one I ask for) 60% of the times I try.

And no, I am not in high ELO where people are willing to adjust to win / are better at more roles.
I am Silver 5, and match with at least a few bronze players every game.

People are people no matter how low their ELO.

It gets harder to swap in higher elos a lot of the time, because a large majority of them are one-tricks.

Plat is probably the most selfish rank. Either that or gold.

Diamond has a lot of the aforementioned onetricks.

Challenger is challenger, idk how that is, not enough samples.
I have played against a Challenger. He went 13/0 without really saying a word.

> [{quoted}](name=MadKnife IV,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=n5m1e4eu,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-01T15:29:17.800+0000)
>
> Or ask if someone wants to trade

or dont lol. I did that yesterday and lost after a huge winning spree. The guy then blames me for the lost hahaha even thought he was the reaason we lost.

Don't ever give up your spot especially if you're confident enough that you can carry.
wut if i'm first pick
Pick Lux. Top, ADC, Jungle. Whatever. Same as banning Lux, but more chance of yohr own team dodging instead. Same result.
as a recent buyer of Elementalist Lux, I can confirm.
i had a support pick shaco bc he "didn't have any supports". Two people right after
You're*

>You're*
>http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/616/861/ba7.jpg

It just didn't feel right without that.
I just play my mains in the lane off meta. Dont give a fuck to be honest.
Maokai ADC is sleeper OP
Renekton ADC + Sion Support sleeper OP
Have yet to be autofilled but I'm not looking forward to Darius support

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=n5m1e4eu,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-12-02T02:27:41.296+0000)
>
> Have yet to be autofilled but I'm not looking forward to Darius support

My nasus mid win rate is deplorable, but my darius mid win rate is hilariously high. Ghost flash CoC darius is scary. Still tho, so many games dropped on nasus mid that I got deranked xD

> [{quoted}](name=Tychusfindlay919,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=n5m1e4eu,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-12-01T18:21:54.640+0000)
>
> I just play my mains in the lane off meta. Dont give a fuck to be honest.

If you're a Teemo main that does this then know that there is a special place in hell for you and people like you.
Just ban Lux in general, you don't want some idiot who throws their money at shiny crap on your side.
i personally prefer classic skin over elementalist skin cuz of the laugh~~ing torture device for enemy~~
But with Elementalists, you now have 10 laughs to torture the enemy with!
quality over quantity, u know?
https://youtu.be/VTaOzFVZIIY?t=34
but what if they use base skin?
Then they're playing an easy burst mage and need to grow out of their comfort zone. It'll be good for everyone.
**you're**
I'm a support main, never had to trade or anything.
I've been auto-filled to ADC when I queued for support...
I can confirm this would work on me
Or just have 2 accounts to alternate dodge times :^)

Another ban

Another Ban

i ban Lux anyways cause i am a bully x3

>PSA: If you don't like the position **your** given..

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/520/073/eb9.jpg
https://media.giphy.com/media/MTxuW7xtBgUG4/giphy.gif
fucking lmao

>Then Ban Lux, someone will dodge. 

Yeah, it's odd what the release of ultimate skins does to people...

That or just play the champ you want to play anyway regardless of which role/position u were given

It's not your problem when people go nuts over you ignoring the meta

Although it's probably best to ask for a position swap first.

Or ban ur teammates yasuo intended pick or ban lux, that seems to work well these days

holy shit yesterday my friend wanted to play lux, we had to wait an hour and a half in queue because people kept dodging everytime we picked it... and we ended up in a stompy game where the enemy surrendered at 20 minutes right after he turned to ice form and laughed... that laugh explains the entire situation so damn well

Amazing isn't it? How much a good portion of this community cares about ranked matches.

"Ranked is not about luck!!!" MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM'KAY
Guess you give no {{champion:99}}
rthat actually sounds op
